name: Girl's Liberty Print Party Dress for Baby to 10 Years - Tatum
description:
This is a truly classic dress for special days...
for party girls, flower girls & girls just in the mood for looking gorgeously pretty.

The bodice of this design has a prettily shaped square neckline, dainty gathered cap sleeves and a slightly raised, piped waistline. Ties come from the side seam to fasten into a bow at the back. Mother of pearl button closure at the back.
The skirt is generously gathered and the length is to just below the knee.

Other options are available for neckline, sleeves and sashes...please feel free to ask.


This dress is made in 'Tatum' Liberty Tana Lawn 
100% cotton.  Machine washable.

Handmade and beautifully finished with a full lining of cotton lawn and french seams.




TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have this dress made in your own choice of Liberty Print please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

name: Girl's Liberty Print Party Dress for Baby to 10 years - Blue Lanthe
description:
This is a truly classic dress for special days...
for party girls, flower girls & girls just in the mood for looking gorgeously pretty.

The bodice of this design has a prettily shaped square neckline and a slightly raised, piped waistline. Mother of pearl button closure at the back.
A separate grosgrain ribbon sash/ belt is worn at the waist seam, threaded through little carrier loops to keep it in place. The sash is fastened with a button and is adjustable. 
The skirt is generously gathered and the length is to just below the knee.

Handmade and beautifully finished with a full lining of cotton lawn and french seams.

Other options are available for neckline, sleeves and sashes...please feel free to ask.

This party dress is made in blue 'Lanthe' Liberty Tana Lawn 
100% cotton. Machine washable.




TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have this dress made in your own choice of Liberty Print please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

name: Girl's Liberty Print Smock Blouse for Baby to 10 Years - Pelagia
description:
This dreamy smock blouse is 
perfect for prettifying jeans...

Blouse has a rounded yoke neckline front and back.
There is soft gathering onto the yoke and 3/4 length sleeves. 
A contrast print is used to highlight the cuffs and as piping around yoke.
Mother of pearl button closure at front.

This blouse is made in blue 'Pelagia' Liberty Tana Lawn.
100% cotton. Machine washable.
     

                                                                                                                                 


TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have this blouse made in your own choice of Liberty Print please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

name: Girl's Liberty Print Peter Pan Blouse for Baby to 10 Years
description:
A very soft & pretty version of the classic Peter Pan blouse...it is more of a smock style. With delightful detailing on the cuffs and hem and plenty of floaty fullness in the body this can be worn relaxed and casual with jeans or dressed up for smart days too.
The length is to hip level and the sleeves are bracelet length. 

This blouse is made in 'Emma & Georgina' Liberty Print Tana Lawn.
100% cotton. Machine washable.

Handmade and beautifully finished. 







TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:

name: Girl's Liberty Print Tunic for Baby to 10 Years - Blue Eliza's
description:
A soft and breezy tunic with plenty of fullness for a 
super pretty yet relaxed look.
Patch pockets give a playful feel and the pretty piping & pearl button details make the tunic perfect for smart occasions too. 

The tunic is softly gathered onto yoke.
A contrast print is used to pipe around yoke and for patch pockets.
Elasticated sleeve cuffs and pocket tops.
Mother of pearl button closures on front shoulders . 

Handmade and beautifully finished.

This tunic is made in blue 'Eliza's' Liberty Print Tana Lawn with pink Eliza's pockets.
100% cotton. Machine washable.




TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have this tunic made in your own choice of Liberty Print please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

The skirt is softly gathered with contrast applique border near hem.
Contrast piping around waist. 
Length is to just below knee level.

name: Baby Dungarees with Liberty Print Lining - La Fleur
description:
Designed for boys & girls. These denim dungarees are a perfect classic, the smartest and most importantly, the sweetest to be found.
Soft Italian denim, fully lined with Liberty Tana Lawn to give a soft finish inside and a delightful contrast when you roll up the leg cuffs.

Button fastening on adjustable shoulder straps and at side waist openings.
Popper fastening around inner leg for easy nappy change.
Smart white top-stitching detail.

These dungarees are made in a mid blue Italian denim with ‘La Fleur’ Liberty Tana Lawn Lining.
100% cotton. Machine washable.





TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have these dungarees made with your own choice of Liberty Print lining please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

name: Liberty Print Short Sleeve Shirt for Boys - Capel
description:
For party days or just to look a bit smarter than usual...
this shirt is perfect!

Not too wide and not too long this little shirt has a cute boxy shape.
It has a neat rounded collar and mother of pearl button closure.  
Lined yoke with pleat from centre back.
Short sleeves and gently curved hemline.
                                                                         

This shirt is made in 'Capel' Liberty Print Tana Lawn.
100% cotton. Machine washable.

name: Liberty Print Skirt for Girls - Tatum
description:
A classic skirt made with a pretty combination of two liberty prints.
Generously gathered and super twirly, this skirt is perfect for party days...or any day.

Skirt has generous gathering onto a yoke with elasticated waist.
Contrast print binding around hem, border and piping around yoke. 
Plain white cotton lawn lining also with print binding around hem.

Length is to just below knee level (see size chart guide).
Given time, it just gets shorter as your little girl grows...giving many years of wear!  

Handmade and beautifully finished with french seams.

This skirt is made in 'Tatum' Liberty Print Tana Lawn with blue 'Gwendoline' Liberty Lawn contrast.
100% cotton. Machine washable.





TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have this skirt is made in your own choice of Liberty Print please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

description:
This charming shirt is perfect for special days and celebrations. The mandarin collar is a lovely alternative to the traditional formal shirt. For a more relaxed look, roll up the sleeves.

Mandarin collar shirt with front placket opening to just below chest level. Small tuck at base of placket is a cute detail especially on smaller and baby sizes. 

Mother of pearl button closure.
Lined yoke.
Full length sleeves with button cuffs.
Softly curved hem.


This shirt is made in blue ‘Lillian's Berries’ Liberty Print Tana Lawn.

name: Liberty Print Corduroy Baby Bloomers
description:
Super snuggly baby bloomers made in a velvety soft Liberty Print Kingly Corduroy. 


Fully lined with a plain cotton lawn for a smooth and comfy finish on the inside...it also gives the bloomers a look of wonderful quality on the outside!

The waist and ankles are softly gathered with elastic. 
For comfort, the elastic is fully encased within the lining.

These bloomers are made in 'Koharu & Miyuki' Liberty Print Kingly Cord.
100% cotton. Machine washable.

TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:

name: Liberty Print Unlined Baby Bloomers - Wiltshire
description:
For babies who are gently 'glowing' in sunny places and warm temperatures I have introduced an unlined version of my bloomers.
These cool & comfy Liberty Print baby bloomers have a sofly gathered, elasticated waist and elasticated ankles.

Handmade and beautifully finished with french seams.
For comfort, the elastic is fully encased within the lawn.


These bloomers are made in 'Wiltshire' Liberty Print Tana Lawn.
100% cotton. Machine washable.


For a more robust bloomer, please see the listing for ‘Liberty Print Baby Bloomers’. This is a fully lined version.

HOW TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER

This tunic can also be made in your own choice of Liberty Print.
Please take a look through the current stock of prints and mention your preference in the customer comments box that will be available at the payment stage.

Alternatively, please email with the following information and a custom order can be generated:

1.	Your name.
2.	The name of the design 
        (e.g. Sundress). 
3.	The name of the Liberty print.
4.	Size required.

The dress is generously gathered, light and airy and has dainty ties to fasten on the shoulder.
Soft elastic to forms gathering and a pretty ruffle around chest.


The knickers are perfectly simple and refreshingly frill free with generous gathers for pretty nappy coverage.

Both the dress & knickers are handmade and beautifully finished with french seams and fully encased elastic for comfort.

The dress can also be ordered on its own. Please see the listing for ‘Liberty Print Sundress For Baby Girls & Older Girls’. 

This sun dress & knicker set is made in blue 'Chive' Liberty Print Tana Lawn
100% cotton.





TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER:
If you would like to have this dress & knicker set made in your own choice of Liberty Print please send an email and a custom order can be arranged.

name: Baby Blanket with Liberty Print Border - Betsy
description:
A perfect gift and a gorgeous keepsake for any new parent or expectant mummy.
Practical and pretty, this little pram blanket has a boarder of silky soft LibertyTana Lawn stitched around a square of cosy cellular weave cotton.
 
This blanket is edged with 'Betsy' Liberty Print Tana Lawn. 
White cellular cotton.
100% cotton. Machine washable.
Pram size: 90cm x 70cm 

Also available in cot size: 
150cm x 120cm

name: Liberty Print Lavender Bags
description:
Made with the Liberty Tana Lawn left over from cutting T&B designs, these sweet little pyramid bags are filled with highly fragrant ‘Intermedia’ lavender grown in Yorkshire.

This listing is for three pyramid lavender bags made with a selection of prints.
Each bag is trimmed with a complimentary shade of the gingham packaging ribbon.
Each little pyramid measures 6.5cm along each edge.

Individual sachets also available (print will be randomly selected).

Please note that lavender cannot be shipped to destinations outside of Europe. 




HOW TO PLACE A CUSTOM ORDER


These lavender bags can also be made in your own choice of Liberty Print.
Please take a look through the current stock of prints and mention your preference in the customer comments box that will be available at the payment stage.

Alternatively, please email with the following information and a custom order can be generated:

1.	Your name.
2.	The name of the design 
               (e.g. Lavender Bag). 
3.	The name of chosen Liberty Print.
4.	Quantity required.

name: Custom Order for Arabella
description:
